word_mean: 月（以月球绕地球公转周期为基准的时间单位）

sentence.Network_en: One month before the deadline we see the hollowness of these promises.
sentence.Network_cn: 离最后期限只有一个月时，我们认识到了这些许诺都是空头支票。

sentence.Network_en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
sentence.Network_cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

sentence.Network_en: He won last month's presidential election by a landslide.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以压倒性多数赢得上月的总统选举。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)a very long, seemingly endless period of time

lj.lj_ly: no one will find them in a month of Sundays.
lj.lj_ls: 在很长时间里，没人会发现他们。

jx.jx_en_mean: An indefinitely long period of time
jx.jx_cn_mean: 一段很长但不确定的时间

lj.lj_ly: It will take you a month of Sundays to chop all that wood.
lj.lj_ls: 你得花费很长时间才能劈完所有的柴

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mōnath, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch maand and German Monat, also to moon

entry.def: A month is one of the twelve periods of time that a year is divided into, for example January or February.

example.ex: The trial is due to begin next month.
...an exhibition which opens this month at London's Design Museum...
example.tran: 这个月在伦敦设计博物馆开办的展览

entry.def: A month is a period of about four weeks.

example.ex: She was here for a month...
Over the next several months I met most of her family...
example.tran: 在后来的几个月里，我见到了她的大部分家人。

means.word_mean: 1. one of the twelve divisions of the calendar year;

sentences.sentence: "he was given a month to pay the bill"

auth_sentence.content: Check back next month for another strip from Ed.

auth_sentence.content: They seldom met, maybe just once a month.

Sentence.sentence: Rod, I hear you'll be leaving at the end of this month.
For the past two months they haven't paid a cent
The grand total over the 10 months they've lived in the three-bedroom house: $

sentences.en: I shall go there next month.
He came again the next month.
He learnt English in ten months.
sentences.cn: 他用10个月的时间就学会了英文。

jushi.english: I'll finish the work in a month.
jushi.chinese: 我一个月后将结束这项工作。

jushi.english: We were in Japan the month we had the great flood.
jushi.chinese: 我们在日本的那个月发了大洪水。

jushi.english: I could meet the same people of the same pitch once a month.
jushi.chinese: 我每个月都能看到一次那同一场地的同一伙人。
